name: Safety 3RD
description:
Arcade driving racing platformer in development for PC and Android.

Enjoy having full control of your vehicle as you can steer, accelerate and brake both axles independently!

Jump, shoot and explode in the 10 levels available in this demo, plus the sandbox level in which you can test every aspect of the game.

A CONTROLLER IS REQUIRED.

In development:

  • Multiplayer 
  • 100 Levels
  • Original music
  • Complete level geometry
  • Touchscreen controls for Android
  • Leaderboards

Multiplayer and windows versions are the same, but as for multiplayer you need 2 or 4 controllers and friends there's a version available that is smaller in size.
